title: A Manifest Information Model for Firmware Updates in Internet of Things (IoT) Devices
source: Software Updates for Internet of Things
abstract:
Vulnerabilities with Internet of Things (IoT) devices have raised the
need for a reliable and secure firmware update mechanism that is also
suitable for constrained devices. Ensuring that devices function and
remain secure over their service lifetime requires such an update
mechanism to fix vulnerabilities, update configuration settings, and
add new functionality.

One component of such a firmware update is a concise and
machine-processable metadata document, or manifest, that describes
the firmware image(s) and offers appropriate protection. This
document describes the information that must be present in the
manifest.
